column3: Revives on death, fully restores character
column4: Revives on death, fully restores character

column3:
Item for online duelist play. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order Fundamentalists. Used to bring back a duelist from the brink of death upon their defeat, and restore them to their natural state.
On death, fully heals HP, FP, restores poise, removes all ailments and dispels all special effects.
column4:
Item for online duelist play. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order Fundamentalists. Used to bring back a duelist from the brink of death upon their defeat, and restore them to their natural state.
On death, fully heals HP, FP, restores poise, removes all ailments and dispels all special effects.

column3: Item for online duelist play. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order Fundamentalists. Used to quickly restore duelists to their natural state before a battle. Fully heals HP, FP, restores poise, removes all ailments and dispels all special effects.
column4:
Item for online duelist play.
Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order Fundamentalists.
Used to quickly restore duelists to their natural state before a battle. Fully heals HP, FP, restores poise, removes all ailments and dispels all special effects.

column3: Grants an infinite supply of any currently held good
column4: Grants an infinite supply of any currently held good

column3: Item for online duelist play. Used to store and retain an infinite supply of goods. Any items used will retain their current quantity. A peculiar bottomless jar. Its origins are unknown. Some deride it as a symbol of unbridled avarice.
column4:
Item for online duelist play.
Used to store and retain an infinite supply of goods.
Any items used will retain their current quantity.
A peculiar bottomless jar. Its origins are unknown. Some deride it as a symbol of unbridled avarice.

column3: Calls phantoms who left their red sign to join your world
column4: Calls phantoms who left their red sign to join your world

column3: Item for online duelist play. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order Fundamentalists. Used to call phantoms who left their red sign to join your world. Requires for at least one phantom to be present in the world already.
column4:
Item for online duelist play. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order Fundamentalists. Used to call phantoms who left their red sign to join your world.
Requires for at least one phantom to be present in the world already.
